summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 3.02, 14.2, 14A.2, 15.21, 16.23, 17.21, 18.2, 19.7, 20.7, 21.6, and 28.2 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to define "Artist" and "Artist Studio/Dwelling" and to permit artist studio dwelling in various zones subject to various conditions.
